age.Description: Age in years as in the initial session, might not be correct for other sessions

sex.Description: self-rated by participant, M for male/F for female

catgoa_mood_anxiety_score.Description: Final score from the Mood and Anxiety subscale of the CATGOA task.

catgoa_phobias_score.Description: Final score from the Phobias subscale of the CATGOA task.

catgoa_externalizing_score.Description: Final score from the Externalizing subscale of the CATGOA task.

catgoa_psychosis_score.Description: Final score from the Psychosis subscale of the CATGOA task.

catgoa_personality_score.Description: Final score from the Personality subscale of the CATGOA task.
